mapper.update: update TB_CRM_PRODUCT set CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_USER_ID = #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COST_PRICE = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUGGESTED_PRICE = #{suggestedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEVELOPMENT_TEAM = #{developmentTeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVELOPMENT_TIME = to_date(#{developmentTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24-mi-ss'), LINK = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = to_date(#{createTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24-mi-ss'), UPDATE_TIME = to_date(#{updateTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24-mi-ss'), DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
